source_note: State baseline derived from NYSDEC Recycling Program and local city ordinances; collection rules vary by municipality.

organics.guidance: New York requires organics separation for large food generators under NYSDEC Part 350; NYC has citywide curbside composting.
organics.bin: Brown/green organics bin or food scrap drop-off.
organics.notes: Residential compost collection active in NYC, Westchester, and Tompkins counties.

paper_cardboard.guidance: Recycle clean paper and cardboard; flatten boxes.

glass_containers.guidance: Recycle glass bottles and jars (rinsed, no lids).
glass_containers.bin: Green recycling bin or mixed bin depending on locality.
glass_containers.notes: Broken or non-container glass not accepted.

metal_containers.guidance: Recycle aluminum, steel, and tin cans; rinse before recycling.
metal_containers.bin: Blue bin or mixed recycling container.

plastics.guidance: Recycle rigid plastics labeled #1–#7 (bottles, jugs, tubs).
plastics.notes: Plastic bags, film, and foam banned statewide.

beverage_containers_crv.guidance: New York has a statewide 5¢ deposit on eligible beverage containers.
beverage_containers_crv.bin: Return to redemption centers or retailers.
beverage_containers_crv.notes: Covers most aluminum, glass, and plastic drink containers.
provenance: New York Returnable Container Act (Bottle Bill)

household_batteries.guidance: Rechargeable batteries banned from trash disposal; must be recycled under NY Rechargeable Battery Law.
household_batteries.bin: Battery collection boxes at retail or HHW events.
household_batteries.notes: Lead-acid batteries must also be recycled by retailers.
provenance: New York Rechargeable Battery Recycling Act (ECL §27-1800)

e_waste.guidance: State law prohibits disposal of electronic waste in trash; recycling required.
e_waste.bin: Drop-off at E-Waste Collection sites or retailers.
provenance: New York Electronic Equipment Recycling and Reuse Act

plastic_bags_and_film.guidance: Plastic carryout bags banned statewide; stores must provide film drop-off.
plastic_bags_and_film.bin: Retail drop-off for film and wraps.
plastic_bags_and_film.notes: Reusable or paper bags required for checkout.
provenance: New York Plastic Bag Waste Reduction Act (2020)

bulky_items.guidance: Schedule bulk pickup with local sanitation department or hauler.
bulky_items.notes: NYC residents must schedule through DSNY Bulk Item service.
provenance: NYC DSNY Bulk Item Collection Rules
